TextBody:
Hello Tai,
My name is Ramon from Netwrix Technical Support, and I've been assigned to your case. I'm currently exploring whether it's possible to block uploads from personal Microsoft Teams while allowing uploads from business Microsoft Teams using Endpoint Protector.

Could you please share your availability for a remote session next week, if needed? Kindly include the days, times, and your time zone.

Thank you.

Best Regards, 
Ramon Torres | Technical Support Engineer
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0OQfmb:ref
Subject: Use DPI Blocking URL blocking MS teams activities for personal account    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0OQfmb:ref ]

TextBody:
Hello again Tai,

I checked with my team, and we found that you can't apply DPI blocking URL blocking selectively to restrict uploads to personal Microsoft Teams accounts while allowing uploads using business accounts because there is no way to differentiate between the two.

Please let us know if you have further questions.

Thank you.

Best Regards, 
Ramon Torres | Technical Support Engineer

TextBody:
Hello Tai,

Thank you for asking this question. I am currently testing to see if it is possible to setup DPI URL blocking to MS OneDrive, to see if the file still will be saved to user’s OneDrive when they share the files through MS Teams. I will let you know once I have finish testing to see if this is possible. 

Thank you.

Best Regards, 
Ramon Torres | Technical Support Engineer
